verses.verse: הִֽתְקוֹשְׁשׁ֖וּ <S%H7197><s%> Gather yourselves together וָק֑וֹשּׁוּ <S%H7197><s%> yea gather together הַגּ֖וֹי <S%H1471><s%> O nation לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> without נִכְסָֽף׃ <S%H3700><s%> not desired

בְּטֶ֙רֶם֙ <S%H2962><s%> Before לֶ֣דֶת <S%H3205><s%> bring forth חֹ֔ק <S%H2706><s%> Before the decree כְּמֹ֖ץ <S%H4671><s%> as the chaff עָ֣בַר <S%H5674><s%> pass י֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> [before] the day בְּטֶ֣רֶם ׀ <S%H2962><s%> Before לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> before יָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> come עֲלֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H5921><s%> and חֲרוֹן֙ <S%H2740><s%> the fierce אַף־ <S%H639><s%> anger יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּטֶ֙רֶם֙ <S%H2962><s%> Before לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> come עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> and י֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> upon you before the day אַף־ <S%H639><s%> anger יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD'S

בַּקְּשׁ֤וּ <S%H1245><s%> Seek אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> ye the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All עַנְוֵ֣י <S%H6035><s%> all ye meek הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> Who מִשְׁפָּט֖וֹ <S%H4941><s%> his judgment פָּעָ֑לוּ <S%H6466><s%> which have wrought בַּקְּשׁוּ־ <S%H1245><s%> seek צֶ֙דֶק֙ <S%H6664><s%> righteousness בַּקְּשׁ֣וּ <S%H1245><s%> seek עֲנָוָ֔ה <S%H6038><s%> meekness אוּלַי֙ <S%H194><s%> it may be תִּסָּ֣תְר֔וּ <S%H5641><s%> ye shall be hid בְּי֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day אַף־ <S%H639><s%> anger יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD'S

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For עַזָּה֙ <S%H5804><s%> For Gaza עֲזוּבָ֣ה <S%H5800><s%> shall be forsaken תִֽהְיֶ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> become וְאַשְׁקְל֖וֹן <S%H831><s%> and Ashkelon לִשְׁמָמָ֑ה <S%H8077><s%> a desolation אַשְׁדּ֗וֹד <S%H795><s%> Ashdod בַּֽצָּהֳרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H6672><s%> at the noon day יְגָ֣רְשׁ֔וּהָ <S%H1644><s%> they shall drive out וְעֶקְר֖וֹן <S%H6138><s%> and Ekron תֵּעָקֵֽר׃ <S%H6131><s%> shall be rooted up ס

ה֗וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Woe יֹֽשְׁבֵ֛י <S%H3427><s%> unto the inhabitants חֶ֥בֶל <S%H2256><s%> coast הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea גּ֣וֹי <S%H1471><s%> the nation כְּרֵתִ֑ים <S%H3774><s%> of the Cherethites דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> the word יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עֲלֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H5921><s%> is against כְּנַ֙עַן֙ <S%H3667><s%> [is] against you O Canaan אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines וְהַאֲבַדְתִּ֖יךְ <S%H6><s%> I will even destroy מֵאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> there יוֹשֵֽׁב׃ <S%H3427><s%> thee that there shall be no inhabitant

וְֽהָיְתָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> become חֶ֣בֶל <S%H2256><s%> coast הַיָּ֗ם <S%H3220><s%> And the sea נְוֹ֛ת <S%H5116><s%> shall be dwellings כְּרֹ֥ת <S%H3741><s%> [and] cottages רֹעִ֖ים <S%H7462><s%> for shepherds וְגִדְר֥וֹת <S%H1448><s%> and folds צֹֽאן׃ <S%H6629><s%> for flocks

וְהָ֣יָה <S%H1961><s%> become חֶ֗בֶל <S%H2256><s%> And the coast לִשְׁאֵרִ֛ית <S%H7611><s%> shall be for the remnant בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah עֲלֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H5921><s%> and יִרְע֑וּן <S%H7462><s%> they shall feed בְּבָתֵּ֣י <S%H1004><s%> thereupon in the houses אַשְׁקְל֗וֹן <S%H831><s%> of Ashkelon בָּעֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H6153><s%> in the evening יִרְבָּצ֔וּן <S%H7257><s%> shall they lie down כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> for יִפְקְדֵ֛ם <S%H6485><s%> shall visit יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> their God וְשָׁ֥ב <S%H7725><s%> them and turn away [שְׁבוּתָם כ] (שְׁבִיתָֽם׃ <S%H7622><s%> captive ק)

שָׁמַ֙עְתִּי֙ <S%H8085><s%> I have heard חֶרְפַּ֣ת <S%H2781><s%> the reproach מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab וְגִדּוּפֵ֖י <S%H1421><s%> and the revilings בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children עַמּ֑וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which חֵֽרְפוּ֙ <S%H2778><s%> whereby they have reproached אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> my people וַיַּגְדִּ֖ילוּ <S%H1431><s%> and magnified עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against גְּבוּלָֽם׃ <S%H1366><s%> [themselves] against their border

לָכֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> Therefore [as] I live אָ֡נִי <S%H589><s%> I נְאֻם֩ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֜וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Surely מוֹאָ֞ב <S%H4124><s%> Surely Moab כִּסְדֹ֤ם <S%H5467><s%> shall be as Sodom תִּֽהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become וּבְנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> and the children עַמּוֹן֙ <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon כַּֽעֲמֹרָ֔ה <S%H6017><s%> as Gomorrah מִמְשַׁ֥ק <S%H4476><s%> [even] the breeding חָר֛וּל <S%H2738><s%> of nettles וּמִכְרֵה־ <S%H953><s%> cistern מֶ֥לַח <S%H4417><s%> and salt וּשְׁמָמָ֖ה <S%H8077><s%> desolation עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> and a עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> perpetual שְׁאֵרִ֤ית <S%H7611><s%> the residue עַמִּי֙ <S%H5971><s%> of my people יְבָזּ֔וּם <S%H962><s%> shall spoil וְיֶ֥תֶר <S%H3499><s%> them and the remnant [גֹּוי כ] (גֹּויִ֖י <S%H1471><s%> Gentile ק) יִנְחָלֽוּם׃ <S%H5157><s%> shall possess

זֹ֥את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לָהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> in תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> return גְּאוֹנָ֑ם <S%H1347><s%> This shall they have for their pride כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> because חֵֽרְפוּ֙ <S%H2778><s%> because they have reproached וַיַּגְדִּ֔לוּ <S%H1431><s%> and magnified עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against עַ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> [themselves] against the people יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3069><s%> God צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts

נוֹרָ֤א <S%H3372><s%> [will be] terrible יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> and כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for רָזָ֔ה <S%H7329><s%> unto them for he will famish אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> all the gods הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וְיִשְׁתַּֽחֲווּ־ <S%H7812><s%> and [men] shall worship לוֹ֙ אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> him every one מִמְּקוֹמ֔וֹ <S%H4725><s%> from his place כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> and all אִיֵּ֥י <S%H339><s%> [even] all the isles הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> of the heathen
גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> O כּוּשִׁ֔ים <S%H3569><s%> Ye Ethiopians חַֽלְלֵ֥י <S%H2491><s%> [shall be] slain חַרְבִּ֖י <S%H2719><s%> by my sword הֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> also ye

וְיֵ֤ט <S%H5186><s%> And he will stretch out יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> his hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against צָפ֔וֹן <S%H6828><s%> against the north וִֽיאַבֵּ֖ד <S%H6><s%> and destroy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַשּׁ֑וּר <S%H804><s%> Assyria וְיָשֵׂ֤ם <S%H7760><s%> and will make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נִֽינְוֵה֙ <S%H5210><s%> Nineveh לִשְׁמָמָ֔ה <S%H8077><s%> a desolation צִיָּ֖ה <S%H6723><s%> [and] dry כַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> like a wilderness

וְרָבְצ֨וּ <S%H7257><s%> shall lie down בְתוֹכָ֤הּ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst עֲדָרִים֙ <S%H5739><s%> And flocks כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All חַיְתוֹ־ <S%H2416><s%> of her all the beasts ג֔וֹי <S%H1471><s%> of the nations גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Both קָאַת֙ <S%H6893><s%> both the cormorant גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Both קִפֹּ֔ד <S%H7090><s%> and the bittern בְּכַפְתֹּרֶ֖יהָ <S%H3730><s%> in the upper lintels יָלִ֑ינוּ <S%H3885><s%> shall lodge ק֠וֹל <S%H6963><s%> of it [their] voice יְשׁוֹרֵ֤ר <S%H7891><s%> shall sing בַּֽחַלּוֹן֙ <S%H2474><s%> in the windows חֹ֣רֶב <S%H2721><s%> desolation בַּסַּ֔ף <S%H5592><s%> [shall be] in the thresholds כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אַרְזָ֖ה <S%H731><s%> the cedar work עֵרָֽה׃ <S%H6168><s%> for he shall uncover

זֹ֞א֠ת <S%H2063><s%> likewise הָעִ֤יר <S%H5892><s%> city הָעַלִּיזָה֙ <S%H5947><s%> This [is] the rejoicing הַיּוֹשֶׁ֣בֶת <S%H3427><s%> that dwelt לָבֶ֔טַח <S%H983><s%> carelessly הָאֹֽמְרָה֙ <S%H559><s%> that said בִּלְבָבָ֔הּ <S%H3824><s%> in her heart אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I am וְאַפְסִ֣י <S%H657><s%> I [am] and [there is] none beside ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> besides אֵ֣יךְ ׀ <S%H349><s%> How הָיְתָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> has become לְשַׁמָּ֗ה <S%H8047><s%> me how is she become a desolation מַרְבֵּץ֙ <S%H4769><s%> to lie down in לַֽחַיָּ֔ה <S%H2416><s%> a place for beasts כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> Everyone עוֹבֵ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> every one that passeth by עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> by יִשְׁרֹ֖ק <S%H8319><s%> her shall hiss יָנִ֥יעַ <S%H5128><s%> [and] wag יָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> his hand ס
